trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around May 11th 2008
divs: sighting detailsfirst off on the 9th late at night my friend and i were sitting outside and i saw a very bright fast green light and turned to blue then went below the trees. it looked like a astoroid shooting down to earth. then last night the 11th my mom and i were sitting outside and started seeing red\white flashing lights in the same area we saw the light fall on the 9th then after awhile we saw one close up aircraft. i guess the way to describe the shape of the lights it was like a boomerang. then we saw a second one which was not shaped like a plane and flew right over us it was so close i could hear a loud motor like sound as it went over. that had more light on it then the other one. then after about a hour all the blinking lights were gone. they all seemed to be going strait forward it was the wierdest thing ive ever seen.
Summary: Red lights in the shape of a boomerang right overhead
